value:
$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Why? I don't understand it.$k$pWhy does this mortal still oppose
me—after I've explained everything?$k$p$EFace|Triandra, tell m—$k$p...$k$p...Isn't that something. With my life,
Triandra and Plumeria could...$k$p$EFace_Anger|No. None of that matters. The only
thing that matters is my brother. Him
and him alone.$k$pNone of that matters...$k$p

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Why would you wish to return
to reality, $Nu?$k$pYou choose misery over happiness?
What do you think awaits you?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Friends! That's what's awaiting!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse is alive and worried! All your
friends have been waiting for you to
wake up for a long time now...$k$pAnd if you don't...you'll never see
each other again!$k$pYou won't ever hear the sound of
one another's voice again... And that
is just too sad for me to stand!$k$pThat's why you have to wake up.
Your friends miss you and want
you to come back to them!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Lady Freyja's getting weaker! We're
close, $Nu.$k$pThis dream will end soon...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Peony, if this dream ends, will you
really die?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, um, well...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I won't allow it! I won't let you
just disappear again.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Sharena...for thinking
of me. I can't say I'm not sad too.$k$pI wish I could stay with you
all forever.$k$pBut the dream has to end.$k$pYou don't need to worry, Sharena.
Once you wake up, it's likely you
won't remember any of this.$k$pSo, you won't even feel sad!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! That's not what I want! If it ends
like this, then...it's no different than
when we were children!$k$pI don't want to lose my
friend again!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|When we were young, we were
so close, and yet I can't remember
what your name was back then...$k$pDoesn't that seem heartless of me?$k$pI don't want to forget you again!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Don't cry, Sharena...$k$pHere, take this.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is this?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|A chain of flowers... You made it
for me back then, when we played
together. I've kept it ever since.$k$pYou have given me so much that
I hold dear. And you continue to
give even still.$k$pThe words you've given me here are
now etched on my heart forever.$k$pAnd even if we do forget, that does
not undo everything that's happened.$k$pWe've been friends ever since we
met in that flower garden. Nothing
can change that, right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But I can't stand the thought
of you dying...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Sharena... But even
the sweetest dreams come to
an end eventually.$k$pWe all must face that reality
at some point.$k$pBut if...if there's some way you can
remember me, then maybe we can
meet again someday, somehow...$k$pLet's both pray that day comes!
There's nothing more we can do,
so no sense in worrying!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Peony...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hee hee! And if it IS possible, oh...
That will make me so, so happy!$k$p$Sbs150|
